title: Manage your GCash account
content:
#### ADVISORY:

Bank Transfer to Maya will be right back! Our partner is working to restore the service as soon as possible.

## Articles in this section

- [My GCash payment or transaction was unsuccessful but my wallet was deducted. How do I get a refund?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/40995097563673-My-GCash-payment-or-transaction-was-unsuccessful-but-my-wallet-was-deducted-How-do-I-get-a-refund)

## Promoted articles

- [What are the steps to get a Fully Verified GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017722393-What-are-the-steps-to-get-a-Fully-Verified-GCash-account)
- [Accepted IDs for GCash Verification](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/900000948786-Accepted-IDs-for-GCash-Verification)
- [How do I send money to another GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017566614-How-do-I-send-money-to-another-GCash-account)

Manage your account information and account access, transaction history, and your linked accounts to GCash.

**[Update your Account Information](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360034342914-Update-Account-Information-in-GCash)**

Learn how to update your email address, name, or birthday in your GCash account.

* * *

**[Register your phone to GCash](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/900005597526-Account-Secure)**

Using GCash on one phone keeps your account secure and prevents unauthorized access.

* * *

**[Download your Transaction History](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360034155433-View-and-download-your-GCash-Transaction-history)**

View and download your transaction history to see all your incoming and outgoing transactions.

* * *

**[Link GCash as a payment method](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/31317342331033-Link-GCash-as-a-payment-method)**

Link your GCash account to your subscriptions or online apps.
